abstract.t: The following idea for a protocol (or service) is offered as an aid to network use for new users:
a single billing and account creation and validation system, so that a manager of a "goal oriented project" could:
authorize a set of user's ids to gain access to and utilize resources at the entire or a specified subset of the server hosts.
create a set of accounts which the users will expend, and which will be used as the breakdown for a single bill to be presented to the project manager.
